title: Retrying failed tests using quarkus:dev mode with Podman causes LastErrorException in the dockerjava library.
body:
### Describe the bug

 I am using quarkus dev mode with an application. Using the console to run the tests and re-run. Without any files modified.
 I see failed tests are restarted but fails to complete the tests and shows a stack trace.

 After this point the replacement [Arc](https://github.com/quarkusio/quarkus/blob/2.6.1.Final/independent-projects/arc/runtime/src/main/java/io/quarkus/arc/Arc.java#L17) atomic reference is never initialized for the container environment. Requires restarting the JVM in Quarkus dev mode.

### Expected behavior

Re-running only the failed tests shows the test report with the same failures.

### Actual behavior

 I am shown a stacktrace indicating a pipe to the Docker daemon was broken.

```
2022-03-23 14:16:54,910 ERROR [io.qua.test] (Test runner thread) Test RunServiceTest#testDataSetCreated(TestInfo) failed
```

### How to Reproduce?

Sorry, no convenient compact reproducer. Build and start an application called Horreum. Using the branch I made available.

dependencies
sudo dnf install -y podman-compose.noarch podman-docker.noarch podman-plugins.x86_64 podman.x86_64 npm.x86_64

steps
git clone https://github.com/whitingjr/Horreum.git
cd Horreum/webapps
npm install
cd ..
podman-compose -f infra/podman-compose.yml up -d
./mvnw clean package quarkus:dev -Dui.dev -DskipTests

wait for Quarkus dev mode to have booted the jvm

Choose the option `r` to run the tests - wait till completed
Choose the option `f` to re-run the failed tests

 At this point I see the stack trace in the "Actual behaviour" section.

### Output of `uname -a` or `ver`

$ uname -a Linux burtha-f34 5.16.14-100.fc34.x86_64 #1 SMP PREEMPT Fri Mar 11 20:24:01 UTC 2022 x86_64 x86_64 x86_64 GNU/Linux 

### Output of `java -version`

$ java -version openjdk version "11.0.13" 2021-10-19 OpenJDK Runtime Environment Temurin-11.0.13+8 (build 11.0.13+8) OpenJDK 64-Bit Server VM Temurin-11.0.13+8 (build 11.0.13+8, mixed mode) 

### GraalVM version (if different from Java)

_No response_

### Quarkus version or git rev

2.6.1.Final or 2.7.5.Final

### Build tool (ie. output of `mvnw --version` or `gradlew --version`)

Apache Maven 3.6.3

### Additional information

 I am using Podman instead of Docker.

```
$ podman-compose version
using podman version: podman version 3.4.4
podman-composer version  0.1.7dev
podman --version
podman version 3.4.4
0
$
```
